ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,John Calnan,J. Winslow Mortimer,Bob Brown
ComicInfo.Title: 13 Rue Morgue!; The Haunted Hands of Guilt; Pity Me.. Please, Please Kill Me!
ComicInfo.Summary:
13 Rue Morgue!: Struggling writer, Leon, lives in famous writer Jacques Tremaine's house for inspiration.
The Haunted Hands of Guilt: Peter kills his manager over the threat of being replaced by a younger pianist. He has an accident and his hands are crushed. When young Johann Brenner dies, his hands are transplanted to Peter.
Pity Me.. Please, Please Kill Me!: Survivors of Stalag 13 find Ludwig Weber (forma Nazi Commandant Colonel Shreiker) in South America and put him in a concentration camp.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
